attributes.action: Change the national anthem to something Jeremy Corbyn would be proud to sing.
attributes.background: I don't believe the British national anthem represents modern Britain. As we move toward a more seculer and culturally diverse society, the national anthem remains inaccessible for non religious people and those from different cultural backgrounds.

rejection.details:
I'm sorry - we cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/108657

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
